output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with an estimated reach of 100,001-500,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Contains explicit call to vote ("Pe 24 noiembrie, votați Marcel Ciolacu pentru un viitor sigur!")
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an organized campaign message with CMF number.
The post contains direct electoral messaging for both: - Presidential elections (Marcel Ciolacu - November 24) - Parliamentary elections (Gabriel Ghilea - December 1)
This is particularly problematic for the presidential election component, as the campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct call to vote for a specific presidential candidate - Paid advertisement with wide reach - Clear electoral messaging - Contains campaign slogans and party identification
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea cu ID-ul 1742822496636862 contine un indemn explicit la vot pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu ("Pe 24 noiembrie, votați Marcel Ciolacu pentru un viitor sigur!"), fiind o reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram cu impact potential intre 100,001 si 500,000 de persoane. Postarea include numar CMF (11240017), demonstrand natura sa de propaganda electorala, si are ca scop clar influentarea votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale din 24 noiembrie 2024.
